text: Apsara Chapagai Khatri (born 1971) is a Nepali politician. In January 2023, she became Deputy Speaker of Bagmati Provincial Assembly. She is a member of the Bagmati Provincial Assembly, having been elected as a proportional representative from the Khas people category in the 2022 Provincial Assembly election. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Apsara Chapagai Khatri
